sn35.131:4.1: At one time the Buddha was staying in the land of the Bhaggas on Crocodile Hill, in the deer park at Bhesakaḷā’s Wood.
sn35.131:4.2: Then the householder Nakula’s father went up to the Buddha …
sn35.131:4.4: “What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings aren’t fully extinguished in the present life?
sn35.131:4.5: What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings are fully extinguished in the present life?” …
sn35.131:4.6: (This should be told in full as in SN 35.118.)
